;

;Doctoral profile:

;

;;Tong Bing, the first doctor of journalism in New China. ;

;

;;A native of Shaoxing, Zhejiang, born in November 1942 in Shaoxing, Zhejiang. ;

;

;;1958-1963, studied at Shanghai Middle School in Shanghai. ;

;

;;1963-1968, studied in the Journalism Department of Fudan University, and was assigned to participate in After hard work and training, one year later he was transferred to "Jintie News" as a reporter and editor of the newspaper. ;

;

;;1978-1981, he was admitted to the Chinese Department of Peking University and became a graduate student after the resumption of the college entrance examination. The first graduate student soon moved back to Renmin University of China with the journalism major, and stayed at the school to teach after graduation. ;

;

;;1984-1988, studied for a doctorate at Renmin University of China, becoming a Chinese-trained The first Ph.D. in journalism, he taught at Renmin University of China after graduation. ;

;

;;In December 1990, he was promoted to professor. ;

;

;;He has been a doctoral supervisor since 1993 and enjoys special allowances from the State Council. ;

;

;;In 2001, he was transferred to the School of Journalism, Fudan University. ;

;

;;In 2012, he was awarded the title of Contributor to Chinese Journalism Education by the Journalism Professional Committee of the China Higher Education Commission and China Journalism Education Award. ;

;

;;Currently a senior professor of liberal arts at Fudan University, a doctoral supervisor, and a researcher on the Marxist view of journalism at Fudan University Director of the Center and Dean of Zhide College of Fudan University. He once served as the convener of the Journalism and Communication Discipline Evaluation Group of the Academic Degrees Committee of the State Council and a member of the fifth, sixth and seventh expert groups of the Postdoctoral Management Committee of the Ministry of Human Resources. ;

;

;;

;

;Tong who was born in 1942 Bing is the first doctor of journalism in New China. (Photo courtesy of interviewee)

;

; 

;

;Become a reporter,  It was a child soldier's wish in middle school. But in more than ten years of study experience, he found that his ideal is still to "engage in academics and do research."

;

;After graduating from the Journalism Department of Fudan University in 1968, the child soldiers were assigned to participate in labor training in Horqin, Inner Mongolia. In 1970, the "Jintie News" accidentally discovered their writing skills to become a journalist.

;

;The tide of the times is carrying budding journalism students drifting in unknown directions. In 1977, news came that the country had resumed the college entrance examination. The child soldiers who were far away from the border regained their fighting spirit to study, and the following year they were admitted to the postgraduate degree in the Chinese Department of Peking University. This year, a full ten years have passed since the child soldier graduated from college.

;

;His mentor during his master's and doctoral studies was journalism educator Gan Xifen. Following in the footsteps of his mentor, Tong Bing devoted himself to the research of Marxist journalism concepts.

;

;Opening up a new research direction requires a lot of basic reading support. Within one year, Tong Bing read through more than 4,000 papers with the word "horse" in them, and also read through all 50 volumes of the complete works of Marx and Engels.

;

;"The complete works of Marx and Engels were published in batches. After the first 39 volumes were read, the last 11 volumes were not published until 1985." Tong Bing said that at that time, the most complete new books could only be seen at the former Central Compilation and Translation Bureau. The child soldier who was still a "poor student" often brought two steamed buns and a cup of boiling water to read in the Translation and Compilation Bureau, sitting there all day long.

;

;After graduating with his doctorate in 1988, Tong Bing stayed at Renmin University of China to take up a teaching position. In more than 40 years of research and teaching career, he has published more than 700 academic papers, published and edited more than 50 books, textbooks, dictionaries, etc., and successively published the "History of Marxist Journalism Thought" and "The History of Marxist Journalism Thought". Academic monographs such as "Classic Course of Marxist Journalism", "Introduction to Theoretical Journalism and Communication", "Journalism Theory", "Comparative Journalism and Communication", "Subject and Mouthpiece - An Examination of the Trajectory of News Communication in the Republic".

;

;"This is how I have been through these years. It can be said that there is no time to breathe and no chance to sleep peacefully. I am constantly breaking through new tasks. Although it was tiring at the time, looking back now, I think it was worth it," he said.

;

;As the first doctorate in journalism independently trained in China, Tong Bing has experienced the process of graduate education in journalism from scratch and witnessed the development of Renmin University of China, The development of journalism at Fudan University, one of the two famous universities in the north and the other in the south.  

;

;"Do knowledge simply and plainly, but don't do simple learning" and "Don't dare to waste a day in life" are the creeds he mentioned many times.

;

;Already octogenarian, Tong Bing is currently a senior professor of liberal arts at Fudan University, still standing on the three-foot podium teaching journalism.

;

;"Truth" is a key word for Tong Bing's academic studies. He once used the four "truths" of "true learning, true understanding, true belief, and true application" The words summarized his lifelong academic insights. His pursuit of truth in learning also allowed him to repeatedly speak out about the shortcomings of the journalism community and the industry.

;

;Journalism research has entered a new era. He directly stated the shortcomings of the development of the discipline, "Among various disciplines, the discipline construction of journalism has developed slowly." In his It seems that in order to solve the development problems of journalism, "it is necessary to calmly spread out the problems and conduct in-depth analysis. This may be good."

;

;"My ideal is not here. Place"

;

;;;Southern Weekend:;; When taking the college entrance examination in 1963 , why did you apply for the Journalism Department of Fudan University?

;

;;Tong Bing:; I wanted to be a reporter when I was in middle school. At that time, I was a student cadre and the president of the student union. I was no stranger to news. . Student cadres who want to take the liberal arts major usually choose the Department of Politics, the Department of International Politics, and the Department of Journalism. At that time, the universities with the best journalism departments in my country were Renmin University in the north and Fudan University in the south. My parents didn’t want me to leave Shanghai, so I took the Fudan exam.

;

;;;Southern Weekend; ;：;;It took ten years between graduating from undergraduate degree and applying for graduate school. Can you talk about this experience?

;

;;Tong Bing:; When I graduated from my undergraduate degree, it was at the end of the "Cultural Revolution" and I was assigned to participate in labor training in the Northeast. I started out as a road maintenance worker building railroads. At that time, all major railway bureaus in our country had enterprise newspapers, and Jinzhou Railway had an enterprise newspaper called "Jintie News". More than half a year later, they found out about me and transferred me to the newspaper as an editor and reporter. The newspaper office often holds correspondent training classes. Since I major in journalism, I often give lectures and have a relatively harmonious relationship with everyone.

;

;After staying there for a while, our country resumed the college entrance examination. At first, the railway didn’t want to let me go because I had already graduated from my undergraduate degree. But later, the Jinzhou Railway Bureau heard that both Renmin University and Fudan University were recruiting master's degree students (there were no graduate students in the journalism major before) and agreed that I would try to take the exam. I passed the exam right away and was the first batch of master's students recruited in our country.

;

;;;Southern Weekend:;;Reform and opening up on your personal destiny What is the impact?

;

;;Tong Bing:; The changes in my personal destiny are closely linked to reform and opening up. Sometimes I often say in meetings or classes that I am very grateful to Deng Xiaoping. If the college entrance examination and university admissions are not resumed, I may still be a reporter at the Jinzhou Railway Bureau tabloid for the rest of my life. If I do well, I may be promoted to deputy editor-in-chief or editor-in-chief. However, my ideal is not in this place. I still want to engage in academics and theory.

;

;;;Southern Weekend:;; During graduate school, Professor Gan was How did that guide you?

;

;;Tong Bing:; Mr. Gan Xifen is also recruiting graduate students for the first time, and his requirements for me are relatively strict.

;

;There were pilot projects before the "Cultural Revolution", but they could not be carried out after a while, so there was no master's degree in journalism before 1978. The lifelong wish of these old gentlemen is to push forward journalism research. The National People's Congress and Fudan University were the first to do relevant work.

;

;Mr. Gan Xifen emphasized two points when guiding me. The first point is to read the original works. He believes that graduate students in journalism should learn more classic works; the second point is to practice. I always insisted on these two points while studying at Renmin University, and I persisted relatively well.

;

;;;Southern Weekend:;;How do you insist on these two points? required? What are the specific methods?

;

;;Tong Bing:; I had classes during the day, read in the afternoon, and went to the journalism department office around 4 o'clock to read the day's newspapers. , we poor students could not afford to subscribe to newspapers at that time.

;

;When I come back from the classroom and library at 9pm, I review the day's newspapers in the dormitory, including the day's "People's Daily" and "China Youth Daily". The review is conducted 5 nights a week, each person is responsible for one week, and several people take turns. The students responsible for reviewing the newspaper should take notes and write a report every week, which should be sent to the newspaper. The newspaper also attaches great importance to our opinions and will reply to us every once in a while.

;

;This arrangement is very helpful to our study. After a 3-year master's degree, I stuck to this method for almost 3 years. We also have many contacts with news organizations and have a relatively close relationship. I did the same thing until I stayed in school to become a teacher after graduation.

;

;Continuously opening new courses and recruiting new students

;

;;;Southern Weekend:< /strong>;;;1;In 1983, the Academic Degrees Committee of the State Council agreed to establish a doctorate in journalism. Under the background of that time, if you graduate with a master's degree and work as a university teacher, your academic qualifications are enough. Why do you continue to study for a doctorate?

;

;;;Child Soldier:;;One is because of the need for theoretical study , studying for a doctoral degree will give you the opportunity to audit courses in many other majors at Renmin University. For example, I have listened to history, scientific socialism, and international politics. When I went to attend classes, none of the teachers refused. They saw that I was not too young and still eager to learn, so they generally allowed me to enter their classrooms, and I often asked questions in class. In this regard, they really treated me. Very considerate: When I go to ask questions after class, other teachers or classmates will stop and let me (ask questions first). In the process of my study, it can be said that many teachers from relevant majors at Renmin University have helped me a lot.

;

;In addition, my supervisor and other teachers in the journalism department hope that I can take the lead in helping the school establish a doctoral program in journalism. Later, the State Education Commission agreed that journalism would have a doctoral degree. At that time, China began to have doctoral programs (in journalism), and two schools were approved, one was the Journalism Department of Fudan University, and the other was the Journalism Department of Renmin University of China.

;

;;;Southern Weekend:;;After graduating from the Ph.D., you stayed He taught at the National People's Congress and returned to his alma mater, Fudan University, in 2001. What did you think at that time?

;

;;Tong Bing:;After completing my master's degree at Renmin University, I stayed in school because of the needs of school work. At that time, our journalism industry was in great need of talents, and young people wanted to join it and go out into the society. But the instructor said something to me, which moved me very much. The Cultural Revolution delayed it for ten years, and they really wanted to restore our major as soon as possible, so they hoped that I could stay and teach in this school with peace of mind. Only by staying in this profession and being a good teacher can this profession continue to have new talents and new developments. I quickly accepted the arrangements in the school and worked hard. I have done a lot of pioneering work over the past few decades. It is very worthwhile when I think about it now.

;

;Moving from the National People's Congress to teaching at Fudan is also an adjustment arrangement for the school. At that time, Fudan was in great need of people. Compared with Renmin University, Fudan's development is more international. Many outstanding students have gone abroad after graduation. The teachers are getting older and their health is getting worse every year. We teachers and students know each other very well, and we see this situation with our eyes and are anxious in our hearts. Therefore, the school raised this expectation and hoped that we can come back to shoulder the heavy burden. I came back without saying anything.

;

;At the beginning, there was a lot of pressure and a heavy burden. Journalism was delayed for many years by the "Cultural Revolution" and is in urgent need of development. The desire for talents is everywhere. So whether I stayed at the National People's Congress or was later called by Fudan University, I just taught with peace of mind, constantly opening new courses and recruiting new students.

;

;This has been the case for these years. It can be said that when there is no time to breathe, there is no chance to sleep peacefully. Although we were very tired at the time, we soon overcame these difficulties and continued to make new progress in our work. Looking back now, I still think it was worth it.

;

;“Understand your mission”

;

;;;Southern Weekend:< /strong>;;In your opinion, what is the overall shift in current journalism research and what are its deficiencies?

;

;;Tong Bing: ;Differences in theoretical viewpoints are inevitable, natural, and reasonable. (The development of journalism research) I think it ultimately depends on the progress of journalism practice. You are right to insist on your point of view. As a result, newspapers and radio and television have been successfully run. This shows that theory guides practice. On the other hand, if your theory is sound and sound, but no one reads your newspaper or listens to your broadcast, it shows that your theory has no power. Isn't this a problem? This is where we theorists feel ashamed.

;

;In addition, there is still a strong culture of self-appreciation in the academic world, which should not be the case. The academic community should review this and analyze the reasons behind it.

;

;;;Southern Weekend:;;Journalism has always faced the "news What do you think of the questioning and debate about "no learning"?

;

;;Tongbing:; The "no-learning theory" has long-term influence on the development of journalism, mainly due to several circumstances. Journalism started relatively late, and there are not many independent scholarships and works. The aspect of journalism that has a deeper impact on China is practice. Running newspapers, radio stations, and television stations are all based on practical work. There are not many people who actually engage in theoretical research. Not big either.

;

;These understandings affect the status and image of journalism in various liberal arts majors. After we got PhDs, China's journalism research gradually got on the right track and started to have something decent.

;

;;;Southern Weekend:;;How do you understand journalists Mission?

;

;;Child Soldier:; Journalists must understand their mission. The simplest and simplest requirement is to report the truth to the people. , real news, that’s the most important thing.  

;

;;;Southern Weekend:;;Journalism Freshman Can you give some life advice to college students who have just entered school?

;

;;Tong Bing:; This is a very broad proposition. I think the life development of college students is the same as the operation characteristics of our entire country. , one wave after another, one tide after another.

;

;As teachers, we hope that the new students can inherit the good traditions of the school and develop them stronger, so that the university will become better and better, and the college students themselves will also become better and better. We can continue to make progress. Only in this way will our country become better and better and our career become more and more brilliant.

;

;So after college students enter university, the first thing is to understand their mission. Everyone should have their own arrangements and expectations. This is not just lip service, it is actually something that must be done. We all came slowly from undergraduate to master's and doctoral degrees. New students especially need to have a sense of mission and have expectations, prospects, and arrangements for the future. I think this is the most important thing. Time flies so fast. Even if you look at the four years of undergraduate studies, half of it has passed in the blink of an eye. However, the task is actually endless. We still need to continue to work hard, strive for, and develop in the future.

;

;College students should not be afraid of being tired. Only by constantly exploring their own prospects can individuals have new goals, new directions, and continuous progress. Learn more every day, overcome your shortcomings, and show new expectations. This is my common expectation for our college students, whether they are undergraduates, masters, or doctoral students.

;July 5, 2020, Xi'an Xianyang International Airport. Visual China Map

;

;Liu Yi is a self-media flight blogger. He daily researches where to find tickets and where the airport services are better. He published " Video content such as "How to get a refund for an expensive ticket" is more popular.

;

;Since the "free transit accommodation scam" at Xi'an Xianyang International Airport was exposed on September 12, 2023, Liu Yi has released 16 videos related to Xi'an Airport, pointing out Its existing management problems have been called the "airport judge" by netizens. With the update of this series of videos, the Xi'an transfer strategy that Liu Yi originally wanted to do has gradually evolved into a "spy war drama". Netizens not only liked and followed it, but also continued to provide clues to Liu Yi. In Liu Yi's account (the account name is "This is not too much"), videos related to Xi'an Airport have become "top-rated" content, and many of them have more than three million views.

;

;On the evening of November 20, Liu Yi once again released a video saying that hotels and B&Bs around Xi'an Airport posted false positioning on the OTA platform (online travel hotel platform) For hotel information, he searched these platforms for a B&B several hundred meters away from the airport, and actually had to take a car there. Previously, the person in charge of Xi'an Xianyang International Airport promised in a media interview that a more powerful comprehensive management mechanism would be established to address the problems existing at Xi'an Airport.

;

;On the afternoon of November 23, staff of the Airport New District Management Committee of Xixian New City, Xi'an told Southern Weekend reporters that the Market Supervision Branch, Comprehensive Law Enforcement Detachment, and Public Security Bureau that day Staff from the Guangde Road Police Station and the Beidu Street Office have formed a joint law enforcement team to inspect the B&Bs in Bianfang Village and Dashoudou Village and urge them to make rectifications. “Regarding Xi’an’s city image, we are still very Attention."

;

;Falsely positioned B&B

;

;As early as Liu Yi released the 10th video related to Xi'an Airport, security personnel can be seen almost everywhere at Xi'an Airport To maintain order, the "liars" who were previously exposed to solicit customers in violation of regulations are hard to find. In the video released on November 20, Liu Yi deliberately took the high-speed train from Beijing to Xi'an in order to avoid leaking his itinerary, and then took a bus to Xi'an Xianyang International Airport to "patrol", which confirmed that the positioning of B&Bs around the airport on the OTA platform was fraudulent.

;

;In this video, Liu Yi searched for the hotel with the closest straight line distance on a platform, and the first-ranked "Jiaxuan Boutique B&B" was marked "from Xianyang The international airport is 340 meters straight." In fact, the passenger arrived at the online car-hailing parking lot, which is the hotel pick-up location. Then he searched on another platform, and multiple Huangzhixiang Hotel branches appeared on the page, one of which was "119 meters "Straight-line distance from Xi'an Xianyang International Airport", but when I called, the other party told me that the hotel is behind the terminal and that I need to wait for the car to pick me up; finally, the Shitouji Inn, which was "less than 100 meters away from you in a straight line" on the third platform, was also falsely positioned. . Liu Yi believes that these B&Bs are engaging in fraud on the OTA platform and are operating in bad faith.

;

;;

;

;2023 11 On March 20, Liu Yi used the online travel hotel platform to search for nearby accommodation at Xi'an Xianyang International Airport. Photo provided by the interviewee

;

;Under the video posted by Liu Yi, many netizens provided screenshots of the above-mentioned negative reviews of the falsely positioned hotel: "Didn't pay attention to the words above The straight-line distance is too deceptive. The hotel is actually more than 8 kilometers away from the airport. It is said to be an inn, but it is actually a room owned by farmers near the airport, and the sanitary rooms are extremely poor." Some netizens said that there are already tourists on the online platform Comments mentioned issues such as long distances and fake room pictures, but this type of B&B still ranks high on the platform.

;

;Liu Yi discovered that the above-mentioned B&Bs were falsely positioned at the online car-hailing parking lot, T3 terminal, and T2 terminal of Xi'an Airport. According to the information he collected, these B&Bs are basically run by villagers from Bianfang Village and Shitou Village near the airport. Because they are close to the airport, these villages have developed a transit accommodation industry.

;

;On November 22, Southern Weekend reporters searched on Ctrip, Tongcheng, Fliggy and other platforms, and only "near Xi'an Xianyang International" was displayed in the hotel list. Airport" but does not show the specific distance. Then type in the search for the three falsely positioned B&Bs mentioned in Liu Yi's video. The Ctrip platform has removed all three stores; however, some platforms can still search for Jiaxuan Boutique Apartment, which shows that it is sold out and cannot be pre-ordered.

;

;The address page of Fliggy Search Jiaxuan Business Hotel is still marked "About 300 meters west of Terminal T2 of Xi'an Xianyang International Airport". When a Southern Weekend reporter called as a customer to ask if the hotel was within the terminal, the staff told her that it was a 3-minute drive outside the terminal and that there would be someone to pick her up.

;

;Liu Yi said that these falsely positioned B&Bs not only appear on the above-mentioned platforms, but also exist on other platforms. On another OTA platform, a store that was marked on the 20th as "less than 100 meters away from Xi'an Xianyang International Airport in a straight line, about a 1-minute walk" was modified on the 22nd to "4.5 kilometers from Xi'an Xianyang International Airport by car, about 9 minutes." When a reporter from Southern Weekend asked why it was only a one-minute walk away, the store owner did not reply directly, but emphasized that "I am outside the airport, and there is no way it is as cheap as ours inside the airport."

;

;On November 22, Southern Weekend reporters contacted four OTA platforms, Ctrip, Tongcheng, Fliggy and Meituan, but received no reply. An industry insider on the OTA platform who did not want to be named analyzed that the platform needs to verify the address of the hotel before it goes online, and also conducts daily verification and inspections after going online. The current listings with false addresses should be due to the operators providing fake business operations. For example, the address on the license or lease contract is the same as the online address, so it is difficult for the platform to identify it. At the same time, various online travel and hotel platforms still have some agent listings, and some listings are closed on one platform and re-listed on other platforms. "If the platform does not effectively intercept, it will be difficult to investigate and deal with it."

;

;The person in charge of the above-mentioned Airport New City told Southern Weekend reporters that the local market supervision department has interviewed three OTA platforms in the past two days and ordered them to strengthen the management of homestays around the airport. Information review. Offline, the joint law enforcement team they formed also conducted focused investigations on several issues mentioned by the blogger, including whether the names on the special industry license, business license, and door plaque were consistent, and whether the pictures on the platform were consistent with the actual situation. etc.

;

;The Dilemma of Passengers’ Rights Protection

;

;A few days after Liu Yi released the video, netizens left messages one after another, talking about their travels in Xiamen, Kunming, Dali, Airports in Shanghai have also encountered similar problems, but there are not many people who choose "hard".

;

; Netizen Zhang Ning landed on Fuzhou Airport on September 4th. At that time, a platform was selected to introduce a hotel just 200 meters away from the airport. The man who took the plane drove for more than ten minutes and took her to a self -built building, saying that this was the hotel. Zhang Ning and the hotel's front desk theory, why the hotel location and photos are different from the platform. The other party said, "That's an old shop, it has been closed", and does not provide specific addresses, letting her take a taxi. At that time, it was late at night. Zhang Ning could only live after weighing again and again, and asked the pick -up personnel to return her back to the airport the next day.

;

; "I originally wanted to give a bad review, but because he had my personal information and dare not give it." Zhang Ning said that she was worried about being retaliated and did not want to give herself. The travel manufacturing is unnecessary. After a few months, Zhang Ning recorded this in Liu Yan's video review area, "I hope that more people will see these problems and support him to defend his rights." & nbsp;

;

; In the video recorded by Liu Yan, the process of exposing the accommodation scam was quite tortuous. On September 12, as a flying blogger, Liu Yi went to Xi'an Airport to experience the transfer of accommodation for the first time. I did not expect that the "scammer" directly took the guests at the door of the airport. Liu Yan simply recorded the video exposure.

;

; ;

;

; Netizens report that Xi'an Airport has transferred accommodation accommodation accommodation Passenger by "Li Gui", the airport promised to continue to improve the passenger experience. Visual China Map

;

; On September 20, the Shaanxi Airport Public Security Bureau stated that it has increased the inspection and control of the inspection and control. The disruption behavior has been fined 148 people since September, and 3 people have been detained. But soon, when Liu Yan arrived at Xi'an Airport again, the scammer shifted from 324 to 322 from the airport, and the security guard did not effectively intercept. In the meantime, Liu Yan began to receive various complaints and private messages.

;

; Wait until Liu Yan landed for the third time Xi'an Airport, and the security target of the security guard became Liu Yan himself. He shouted "He has passed" in the walkie -talkie. In that trip, some netizens informed Liu Yan's itinerary information. According to the screenshot provided by netizens, Liu Yan flew to Xi'an in Shenzhen on October 24th. The news of Liu Yan was about to go to Xi'an at the black car group at the Xi'an Airport at 18:42, reminding everyone to be careful. To this end, Liu Yan had to report to the police.

;On the evening of November 28, 2023, Beijing time, Pinduoduo’s intraday trading repeatedly hit new highs, rising by more than 18%. Within fifteen minutes, the market value increased by $100 million.

;The fierce reaction of the capital market stems from Pinduoduo’s outstanding performance in the third quarter of 2023.

;

;On November 28, Pinduoduo (PDD.Nasdaq) released its financial report for the third quarter of 2023 (hereinafter referred to as the "financial report"), with revenue of 68.84 billion yuan, a year-on-year increase of 94%, not in accordance with U.S. GAAP (Non-GAAP), net profit attributable to Pinduoduo’s ordinary shareholders was 17.027 billion yuan, a year-on-year increase of 37%.

;The new theatrical film "The Point of the Knife" is the latest version of "The Wind" "Sister volume of ".

;

;;;

;;Today, 14 years after its release, "The Wind" is still the leading Chinese-language spy suspense film. 600,000 people gave it a high score of 8.4 on Douban, which is better than 95% of dramas and 98% of thrillers. In comparison, "The Point of the Knife" has a Douban score of 6.1, and it is unlikely to reach the heights of "The Wind" in terms of both word-of-mouth and box office. ;

;

;;

;

;;

;

;;"The Point of the Knife";;Adapted from Mai Jia's ;; novel of the same name, the background is set in Nanjing in the 1940s. Military agent Jin Shenshui;; (played by Zhang Yi);; has been lurking in the Wang Puppet Government for many years, dealing with all forces, walking on thin ice. ;

;

;;

;

;;On the surface, Director of the Secret Service Jin Shenshui and Director of the Security Bureau Lu Jingyu;; (played by Huang Zhizhong);; and Secretary Lin Ying Ying;; (played by Lang Yueting);; belongs to the same camp, but in fact they do not trust each other. ;

;;

;

;;

;

;;Deputy Director of the Security Bureau Yu Zhiren;; (played by Gao Jie);; has won over another force in the Security Bureau: the anti-special forces Chief Li Shiwu;;(played by Sha Yi);;, Deputy Director Xiaoma;;(played by Li Chun);;, Confidential Division Deputy Director Qin Guangguang;; (played by Jin Shijia);;. Yu Zhiren also holds the title of Commissioner of the Police Station, so he and Lu Jingyu have a rivalry. ;

;

;;

;

;;The first half of the plot of "The Point of the Knife" revolves around the office politics of the Security Bureau. The Japanese military officer issued an order to "find out the insider", which triggered an office struggle among insiders.

;

;To be fair, ignoring the bugs in the character's logic, this part is quite watchable, and it is vaguely a low-end version of Qiuzhuang's ghost-catching in "The Wind". Lu and Yu's small team took action one after another, some to protect themselves, others to bite each other. It didn't matter who the real mole was, what was important was to take the opportunity to eliminate dissidents. ;

;

;;

;

;;Why is it called a low-end version? Because there is a clear MacGuffin in "The Wind" (the focus of the suspense film) - who is the old ghost. However, "The Point of the Knife" revealed the truth to the audience from the very beginning. The identities of Jin Shenshui and Lin Yingying were two bright cards that were played too early, and there was no suspense left. We're just waiting to see how they can use their strength to survive the internal purge. ;

;

;;

;

;;The highlight of "The Wind" is by no means torture, but this was highlighted in the pre-release marketing in the past. The trailers and character specials of "The Edge of the Knife" also have similar ideas. It mainly highlights the continuous punishment stunts during the internal fighting, such as pulling out nails, pouring sulfuric acid, sitting on the tiger bench, etc. ;

;

;;

;

;;In addition, the director made reasonable use of the characteristics of the actors' past high-profile roles;; (for example, Huang Zhizhong's performance is similar to the role of Yang Liren in "The Righteous Way in the World is Vicissitudes of Life");; span>;;, so that they can maintain stable performance while performing experiential performances,; at least the audience can accurately grasp the characters they convey.

;

;The cruel scenes that challenge the physical limits, the medium-to-high-intensity "werewolf killing" and the survival game in which everyone is in danger ensure the tension in the first half of the film. But unfortunately, since the victory of the Lu faction and the end of the internal fighting, the film has fallen into piecemeal chaos.

;

;The first hour and the last hour of "The Point of the Knife" are as separate as if they were not the same movie. The second half of the film focuses on Jin Shenshui's abandonment of darkness and the light under the influence of Lin Yingying, the destruction of the military command group in Nanjing, and the two men's revenge like lone rangers. ;

;

;;

;

;;Because the plot was too complicated and fragmented, and the time; span was long, the director had to arrange multiple long monologues for Jin Shenshui, with voiceovers revealing the changes in the situation and the characters. destiny. On the contrary, it proves that the film is unable to tell stories with pictures and characters.

;

;;;

;;Although there are many characters appearing in the first half, they still have distinct personalities. But the characters who appear in the second half, such as the members of the military command team stationed in Nanjing, Lin Yingying's relatives, etc., these supporting roles are too homogeneous. In fact, there is no need to type subtitles for every person who appears, nor do you need to give everyone equal time. ;

;

;;Such a passing character and a hastily explained ending give the second half a sense of déjà vu and a sense of cohesion in the narrative;

; span>;Compared with the first half, it can be regarded as loose prose.

;

;To use a common saying to describe the impression of "The Point of the Knife", it is "a rush of energy, then fading, and three times exhausted". The more you watch, the more discouraged you will be, until it collapses thousands of miles. The film wants to portray the change of mentality of the triple agent. It stands to reason that the character will be highlighted and sublimated at the end, but this mechanism obviously fails in this film.

;

;;;

;;"The Edge of the Knife" is not as good as "The Wind", which has a lot to do with the tendency of film and television adaptation. ;;The original work of "The Sound of the Wind" is divided into Dongfeng, West Wind and Jingfeng. From the perspectives of different narrators, it restores the ghost-catching past events in Qiuzhuang with different versions that are difficult to distinguish between true and false. If it were shot strictly according to the logic of the original work, it would be a polished remake of "Rashomon." ;

;

;;But the director accurately picked out the main line of the story, filled it with flesh and blood, and drastically deleted unnecessary plots. ;

;

;;The film version of "The Wind" is a bit like a colorful stage play, and it does use the three principles of drama;; (observe time , location and actions are consistent);;——The isolated Qiuzhuang is an excellent stage for the story to be staged. The protagonists with different thoughts seek faith and survival. Time and space are further compressed to highlight the characters and stories as much as possible. ;

;

;;

;

;;The original work of "The Point of the Knife" is divided into upper and lower volumes. The positive side is about Jin Shenshui, and the negative side is about Lin Yingying. Together they are the complete context of the history of the two fighting side by side. This novel focuses on the growth of the characters and has a large span, which makes the adaptation quite difficult. ;

;

;;The problem with the film version is precisely that it; wants to completely present the whole character, but ends up copying the gourd and being constrained by the original work. Based on the size of the original work, it would be a good choice to make a 40-episode TV series. The 120 minutes of the film version is really difficult to carry such complex characters and emotions. It is better to only retain the first half of the film and delve deeper into the characters to make them fuller and richer.

;

;;;

;;Even without "The Wind", "The Point of the Knife" would not be considered a success;;. Because it was difficult to choose side branches from the main plot, the movie was turned into a double-speed explanation video of the TV series, which was really a mistake. ;

;

;;Director Gao Qunshu also has "The Gunslinger" and "Gunshots from the Secret Service" on his waiting list. ;; I don’t know when they will be released. Once again, we can see a spy thriller on the big screen comparable to "The Wind". ;;;

;The rapidly developing green finance has been clearly promoted to a national financial strategy.

;

;After the Central Financial Work Conference listed green finance as one of the "five major articles" that must be done well, the Research Bureau of the People's Bank of China recently published a report According to the article "Promoting the Effective Connection of Green Finance and Transformation Finance", as of the end of the third quarter of 2023, my country's green loan balance and domestic green bond market balance have reached 28.58 trillion yuan and 1.98 trillion yuan respectively, ranking first and second in the world respectively. Bit.

;

;The Central Bank Research Bureau also said that it will draw on its experience in setting green financial standards, gradually launch transformational financial standards that are applicable to all types of financial products, and will strengthen carbon accounting. and environmental information disclosure requirements.

;

;What is more worth mentioning is that since the "Green Finance Guidelines for the Banking and Insurance Industry" was implemented in 2022, banking and insurance institutions have increasingly paid attention to green financial services and their own Environmental, social and governance performance. Statistics from the Insurance Association of China show that as of the end of June 2023, green insurance’s half-year premium income was 115.9 billion yuan; the balance of insurance funds invested in green development-related industries was 1.67 trillion yuan, a year-on-year increase of 36%.

;

;With the efforts of relevant ministries and regulatory agencies, what is the green finance report card of various banks and insurance companies? Southern Weekend New Finance Research Center has constructed a green finance indicator system based on the principles of fairness, justice and science to evaluate the purity of green finance of financial institutions.

;

;;The Six;;Big Dimensions of the Green Finance List;

;

;In view of the different business structures of financial institutions in the banking and insurance industries, Southern Weekend New Finance Research Center has set up different evaluation index systems to evaluate green finance in the banking and insurance industries respectively. Development status, and explore how various bancassurance institutions can further enhance their green financial business and improve their own ESG performance.

;

;Southern Weekend New Finance Research Center conducts qualitative and quantitative inspections and evaluations of commercial banks from the four dimensions of green financial products, environmental contribution, social responsibility and ESG governance. Insurance institutions are evaluated qualitatively and quantitatively based on four dimensions: economic performance, environmental performance, social performance and corporate governance. The quantitative and qualitative scores account for 70% of the total weight.

;

;At the same time, the Southern Weekend New Financial Research Center team assigned media factor weights based on special research on the above-mentioned institutions, and invited an external expert jury to evaluate the above-mentioned companies. Conduct a review. The weight of the two scores is 15% each. Among them, the media factor mainly refers to the openness and transparency of the financial institutions under investigation to media research.

;

;;Bank ranking indicator system;;:;;12;;second-level Indicators  ;;25;;three-level indicators;

;

;Southern Weekend New Financial Research The center inspected and evaluated 20 commercial banks from six dimensions, and set up 12 second-level indicators and 25 third-level indicators, and then gave different weights to different sub-indicators based on their importance.

;

;;

;

;Green Finance Ranking Bank Ranking Indicator System (Liang Shuyi, Liu Yuyu/Photo)

;

;The quantitative and qualitative indicators of the bank ranking indicator system are explained as follows:

;

;(1) Green financial products.

;

;What is the connotation and extension of green financial products? For commercial banks, in accordance with the relevant provisions of the "Green Finance Evaluation Plan for Banking Financial Institutions", Southern Weekend New Finance Research Center will include green loan balance, growth rate, proportion, total issuance amount of green bonds, and underwriting scale into the banks in the 2023 Green Finance List List evaluation indicators. The total weight of the five third-level indicators in this dimension is 16%.

;

;(2) Environmental contribution. Environmental contribution refers to the actual contribution and performance of financial institutions in environmental protection.

;

;On the one hand, in order to promote the realization of the "double carbon" goal, various financial institutions have actively established green and low-carbon operating systems, formulated carbon emission targets for the future period, and established The carbon emission statistics platform calculates its own greenhouse gas emissions and per capita greenhouse gas emissions, analyzes its own carbon emission potential, and provides data support for low-carbon operation management. On the other hand, various financial institutions have established the concept of "green operation office" to reduce the impact of operating activities on the environment.

;

;Southern Weekend New Financial Research Center combines publicly disclosed information and uses greenhouse gas emissions and per capita greenhouse gas emissions to examine the green and low-carbon operating systems of various financial institutions. Per capita energy consumption and per capita water consumption are used to measure the performance of each financial institution in green operations. Overall, the higher the environmental contribution of a financial institution, the better its green and low-carbon operations are, the less damage it causes to the environment, and the higher its carbon neutrality efficiency and energy utilization efficiency. The total weight of the four third-level indicators in this dimension is 8%.

;

;(3) Social responsibility. Social responsibility refers to the performance of social responsibilities of financial institutions, social evaluation, and employee development and protection.

;

;This indicator includes four levels: First, it refers to financial institutions adhering to the original intention of serving financial entities, actively serving the country's major strategic deployments, and guiding the flow of financial resources to national priorities. Support real economic industries such as advanced manufacturing and technology innovation enterprises, and improve the inclusiveness of financial services. The weight of relevant indicators is 15%.

;

;The second refers to financial enterprises implementing the rural revitalization strategy, allocating financial resources to all aspects of rural economic and social development, increasing the supply of agricultural-related credit, and consolidating and expanding The results of poverty alleviation and rural revitalization have been effectively linked with financial support. The weight of relevant indicators is 9%.

;

;The third refers to financial institutions facing the current situation of China's aging population, participating in the construction of the three pillars of the pension security system, providing high-quality pension financial services, and developing electronic vouchers for medical insurance and social security promotion and application to optimize social security services. The weight of relevant indicators is 8%.

;

;The fourth refers to the development of financial institutions’ own human capital, which is mainly reflected in employee training coverage and per capita training hours, and the establishment and improvement of a standardized, multi-level talent training system. , laying the foundation for employees’ personal career development. The weight of relevant indicators is 4%.

;

;To sum up, the four second-level indicators under this dimension include a total of 13 third-level indicators, with a total weight of 36%.

;

;(4) ESG governance. ESG governance here refers to whether financial institutions have established organizational structures and performance assessments that are compatible with green finance, environmental contribution and social responsibility. ESG performance is an important consideration for financial companies' sustainable development capabilities, and ESG concepts have become an important concept for investors' investment decisions.

;

;More and more financial institutions have established ESG governance structures, set up specialized departments or offices to take charge of green finance and other work, and incorporated ESG-related indicators into their performance appraisal systems to Motivate employees to achieve better green financial performance. At the same time, listed companies are subject to ESG ratings by major rating agencies. This list uses MSCI rating results to measure the ESG governance performance of each financial institution, comprehensively reflecting the ESG performance of each financial institution in authoritative rating agencies. The total weight of the three third-level indicators in this dimension is 10%.

;

;Southern Weekend New Financial Research Center evaluated the relevant indicators of 20 commercial banks based on the above dimensions and indicator system, and using 2022 to 2023 as the observation period. Score.

;

;The green finance list of banking financial institutions shows that Industrial and Commercial Bank of China, Agricultural Bank of China and Industrial Bank rank among the top three. They are also the only three commercial banks with a total score of more than 70 points.

;

;;

;

;Green Finance List Bank List (Liang Shuyi, Liu Yuyu/Photo)

;

;;The four major banks: ICBC and Agricultural Bank of China;;each has its own;;lead;

;

;In order to conduct an in-depth analysis of the outstanding performance of different types of commercial banks in the field of green finance, the Southern Weekend New Finance Research Center focused on analyzing the green finance initiatives taken by commercial banks with outstanding performance in each sub-category.

;

;Overall, the total green loan balance of state-owned banks is much higher than that of other banks. For example, at the end of June 2023, the balance of ICBC's green loans reached 5 trillion yuan, accounting for more than 30% of the bank's total loans; state-owned banks are also at the forefront of the total green bond issuance and green bond underwriting amount indicators. For example, by the end of 2022, Bank of China’s green bond issuance amounted to 87.7 billion yuan, and its green bond underwriting amount was 453.9 billion yuan, ranking first.

;

;In terms of ESG governance, the six major banks have all set up organizational structures and performance appraisal systems that are compatible with green finance. The latest ESG rating results announced by MSCI also All were A-level and received full marks.

;

;In the field of social responsibility, the six major banks all performed well in aspects such as aging-friendly services, issuance and promotion of electronic social security cards and electronic medical insurance vouchers, and received full marks.

;

;The difference is that the balance and proportion of ICBC green loans, the balance and proportion of agriculture-related loans, and the balance and proportion of manufacturing loans are The indicators ranked first among the four major banks. Although its total greenhouse gas emissions and per capita energy consumption are higher than the other three major banks in terms of environmental contribution, its overall ranking is still first.

;

;Agricultural Bank of China’s green loan balance and manufacturing loan balance are second only to ICBC, but the growth rate of green loan balance is the fastest among the four major banks; at the same time, The bank's county-level green loan balance and proportion rank first among its peers. As of the end of June 2023, the bank's cumulative scale of carbon emission reduction loans issued and the reduction of carbon emissions it has driven are among the best among its peers. Although the overall score of Agricultural Bank of China is 5.25 points lower than that of ICBC, it is significantly ahead of the other two major state-owned banks, seizing the "second spot".

;

;;Joint-stock banks: Xingye stands out;

;

;Overall, joint-stock companies The green loan balance of banks is weaker than that of state-owned banks, and the average proportion of green loan balance is about 11%, which is far smaller than the 18% average of large state-owned banks. This shows that joint-stock banks are weak in green loans to support the development of green industries. At the same time, joint-stock banks rarely issue green bonds, and the average size of green bond underwriting is only about 1/10 of large state-owned banks, which also shows that joint-stock banks are weak in green financial products.

;

;But there are not no benchmarks among joint-stock banks. Industrial Bank performs well in indicators such as green loan balance, agriculture-related loan balance, manufacturing loan balance, and inclusive small and micro enterprise loan balance, all ranking among joint-stock banks. In Mingsheng ESG Ratings, Industrial Bank also ranks with the four Major banks also received an A grade. At the same time, Industrial Bank's competitiveness in the field of green finance has also been recognized by most review experts, and its number of votes in the field of green finance tied for first place with Industrial and Commercial Bank of China.

;

;Therefore, Industrial Bank’s comprehensive score beat all banks, beating Bank of China with an advantage of 3.32 points, and was rated as the "Green Finance Ranking of the Banking Industry". Exploring flowers".

;

;;City commercial banks: better incremental indicators;

;

;Received Due to the disadvantages of scale and volume, city commercial banks are generally inferior to state-owned banks and joint-stock banks in the green finance rankings, but they generally perform better in growth indicators.

;

;Judging from the overall score, Bank of Nanjing, which performed best, ranked 8th. The score even exceeds that of major state-owned banks and leading joint-stock banks that far exceed its own scale.

;;Serving the real economy;;:;;State-owned banks;;do their best< /strong>;

;Overall, state-owned banks are members of the first echelon of social responsibilities, and the second and third echelons are joint-stock banks and city banks. commercial Bank.

;When examining the services of commercial banks to the real economy, Southern Weekend New Finance Research Center chose to measure the services of commercial banks to manufacturing loans and inclusive small and micro enterprise loans. ;Joint-stock banks perform well in pension finance and employee human capital development. Relatively speaking, city commercial banks still do not disclose comprehensive information on employee human capital development.

;

;;ESG governance shows obvious echelon characteristics;

;

;Looking at it as a whole, The ESG governance dimension of commercial banks shows relatively obvious echelon characteristics.

;

;

;

;At the same time, the Southern Weekend New Financial Research Center comprehensively rated nine life insurance companies from the two dimensions of expert review and media factors (each accounting for 15% weight) , to build a green finance list for the insurance industry.

;

;;

;

;Recently, "Internet short dramas" have become the focus of public opinion, "Hengdian turns into a vertical store" and "Boss short drama harvests" Topics such as "Europe and America" ​​have been on the hot searches in turn. The former refers to the fact that Hengdian Film and Television Base is now dominated by the "vertical screen short drama" shooting team; the latter refers to the short drama application platform ReelShort, which has begun to conquer overseas markets and even topped the U.S. iOS entertainment list.

;

;On November 22, the "2023-2024 China Micro-Short Drama Market Research Report" released by iiMedia Consulting showed that China's online short drama market size will be 37.39 billion yuan in 2023, a year-on-year increase of 267.65%. A total of 481 new short dramas were released in the first half of 2023, exceeding the level for the whole of 2022. It is estimated that the size of China's short drama market will reach 100.68 billion yuan in 2027.

;

;The rise of short videos has not only reshaped the audio-visual habits of netizens, but also accommodated netizens’ search, shopping, entertainment, and social needs: from search engines to short video platforms, from TV series to Switching to short dramas, switching from playing online games to watching short videos, switching from e-commerce shopping to live streaming... "Short Video+" is profoundly affecting the ecology of the Internet industry.

;

;As a result, various major Internet platforms have derived new business models of "short video + advertising" and "short video + e-commerce", which have greatly subverted the traditional profit model: ByteDance recently announced the contraction of its gaming business, Short videos are fully embraced; the time spent watching short videos by netizens has exceeded the time spent on online games; traditional online writers are rushing into new tracks; major film and television bases have turned into "vertical screen versions"... These phenomena show that the short video era has created a new era of short videos. The rise of the drama has also profoundly changed the overall ecology of the upstream and downstream industrial chains.

;

;The "2023 China Online Audiovisual Development Research Report" shows that among the 1 billion short video users in 2022, about 50.4% of users have watched short dramas within 3 minutes. The size of the short drama market in 2023 will almost reach half of the national movie box office, creating many traffic miracles and myths of sudden wealth. For example, in September 2023, the traffic miracle of "Wushuang" exceeded 100 million in revenue in 8 days, which caused a sensation. , the myth of getting rich "completed in one week, released in one month, and achieving financial freedom" is also widely circulated.

;

;The success of short plays is rooted in human nature, which is a deep need that people cannot erase. Human nature naturally loves "refreshment", "hate" and "relief", seeks emotional catharsis, and longs for emotional compensation. While the audience scolded the stereotyped short drama, they still couldn't help but finish watching a short drama with dozens of episodes before going to bed and experiencing the excitement of "it turns out that success and love can come so quickly."

;

;Short plays can often satisfy people's certain "feelings" and "hit" the inherent pleasure mechanism of human nature. Themes such as "Grand grudges between wealthy families", "Marriage first, love later" and "The domineering president fell in love with me" are everlasting. Revenge, counterattack, the boss's sweet pet, a golden son-in-law, marrying into a wealthy family... Such plots are also repeated many times. Can't get tired of watching it. The protagonist of the short drama has either become an alternative Count of Monte Cristo, or a film and television version of "Long Aotian" or "Mary Sue", or it seems to be the product of pressing shortcut keys on a long and drawn-out urban emotional drama.

;

;Slightly different from the previous Internet ecology, the current industry supervision has become more and more synchronized, which is a new situation worthy of attention. The recent news that "Tik Tok, Kuaishou, and WeChat platforms are jointly cracking down on illegal short dramas" is also consistent with the fact that the State Administration of Radio, Film and Television has "already removed 25,000 short dramas from the shelves. The next step will be to launch a one-month special rectification work on online short dramas." ” echoed the announcement.

;

;It can be seen that the Internet industry has indeed been "leading the way for three to five years." Past success may not be maintained for a long time in the face of new trends. The rise of short dramas with the help of short videos fully illustrates this point. At the same time, the "reckless state" of the Internet industry's barbaric growth and turf racing has passed, and the advancement of technology and industry and the follow-up of regulatory regulations are increasingly showing a "same frequency" state. In compliance with regulatory requirements, the pursuit of high-quality and high-quality content will still be the main focus of the short drama market in the future.

;

;Overlooking Fook Sin Hall. Photographed by “Anonymous”

;

;Since I first saw Fook Sin Tong in 2017, I have never forgotten it. "No name for now" is his online name, and acquaintances call him "No name for now." Even if the discovery of a Yuan Dynasty wooden building in the south was enough for him to leave his name in the history of architecture, he decided not to leave his name for the time being.

;

;Walk around the mountains and rivers of Fujian for a while, just like visiting old friends, to look for the historical buildings hidden deep in the ancient villages and scattered along the ancient roads. His "discovery" of Fu Shan Tang was accidental, or it might be inevitable.

;

;Fushan Hall is located in Zhengwei Village, Dikou Town, Jianou City, Fujian Province. It is a group of vernacular temple buildings, which conforms to the usual orientation rules of Chinese architecture: "sitting Different from "north to south", Fushan Hall conforms to the mountainous terrain of Zhengwei Village and faces south as a whole. The main hall is dedicated to the Three Treasures, and the left and right side halls are dedicated to Guanyin and King Dongping. It is a blend of Buddhism, Taoism and folk beliefs that are common in village temples.

;

;The main hall faces a Qing Dynasty stage across the courtyard, and is integrated with the main hall through the corridor. Before the main hall was confirmed as a Yuan structure, the stage was the narrative center of the entire building complex. When people in the village talked about Fu Shan Tang, they would always talk about the story of the stage, but they were completely unaware of the main hall.

;

;The "discovery" of Fu Shan Tang was not to find the existence of this building, but to confirm its identity as being built in the Yuan Dynasty. This time is July 18, 2023. That day, Liu Yan witnessed a "highlight moment" that has yet to come.

;

;Liu Yanhe has traveled almost all over the landscapes of southern Zhejiang and northern Fujian for more than ten years. He studies woven wooden arcade bridges. An amazing bridge structure unique to the Fujian and Zhejiang mountains. The same interests led him to meet each other very early on, and they have been online friends for seven or eight years.

;

;Zhengweicun not only has Fushan Hall, but also has two covered bridges from the Qing Dynasty. In July 2023, Liu Yan took graduate students to survey and map in Zhengweicun Covered Bridge, I didn’t hear that they were in Fujian yet, so I drove here from Fuzhou, holding a newly purchased infrared camera in my hand.

;

;Hundreds of years of burning paper and smoke, the beams of the main hall of Fu Shan Tang have been smoked black by the incense of believers. The inscriptions written by the ancients on the beams It is impossible to find it and can only be roughly dated based on its style. Using an infrared camera, it is possible to see traces of writing beneath the smoke.

;

;;

;

;In October 2023, instead of standing on the ladder, use an extended pole to connect the shooting instrument to observe the details of the components on the beams of Fushan Hall. Photo by Southern Weekend reporter Wang Huazhen

;

;According to preliminary observations, the main structure of Fushantang Hall is relatively complete, with shuttle columns, column foundations, humps, and replacement wood etc. The obvious early features, such as the planar column network and frame beams, are quite similar to the main hall of Shunchang Baoshan Temple built in the 23rd year of Yuan Zhizheng (1363) with a stone imitation wood structure. Through rough dating of style, it is not possible to judge that the structure of Fushan Hall is no later than the early Ming Dynasty, and may even be in the Yuan Dynasty.

;

;On that day, Liu Yan was not taken into Fushan Hall for the time being. While Liu Yan was still looking at the entire courtyard with unfamiliar eyes, he had already gone straight to the point and raised his infrared camera to identify the ink characters on Zhengliang.

;

;At first, Liu Yan didn't know what he saw through the infrared camera, because his expression didn't change much. He just raised his head to take a picture, and then lowered his head to confirm... Suddenly, he stopped getting excited. He held his breath, got excited, calmed down again, quickly checked on his mobile phone, and cautiously confirmed again. He no longer suppressed the ecstasy in his heart: "Yuan Dynasty! The greatest!"

; < p style="text-align: left;">;The inscription on the main beam shown in the infrared camera clearly reads: "On the ninth day of the eighth month of Wushen, the first year of Wei Zhi's reign, Yiwei came to Fucheng... Congratulations for the reconstruction of the city..."

;

;On November 25, 2023, the UNESCO Representative Office in China and relevant government agencies of Fujian Province and Quanzhou City hosted the "East Asian Wood Structure Building Protection and "Utilizing International Academic Exchange Conference", at which Lou Jianlong, deputy director of Fujian Museum, gave a speech entitled "Early Architecture and Characteristics of Fujian". During his speech, Lou Jianlong mentioned Fu Shan Tang. This may be the first time that Fu Shan Tang has been officially recognized as a newly discovered Yuan Dynasty building and mentioned at an international conference.

;

;The existing main structure of Fushan Hall was founded in the first year of the Great Rebellion, that is, 1307. Before it, the earliest known Yuan Dynasty wooden structure in southeastern China was the Yanfu Temple in Wuyi, Zhejiang, built in 1317, the fourth year of Yanyou in the Yuan Dynasty. The newly confirmed Fushan Hall in Zhengwei Village has now become the earliest Yuan structure in the southeast.

;

;Cheng - the "hedge" of two time differences

;

;Zhengwei Village, where Fushan Hall is located, is located among the mountains in northern Fujian middle. The ancestor of the Zheng family who came to the village was Zheng Hao from the Song Dynasty. Zheng Fawang, secretary of the village branch, took out a photocopy of the "Genealogy of the Zheng Family" compiled during the Wanli Period of the Ming Dynasty, which recorded the story of the Zheng family's entry into Fujian and their reproduction in Jianzhou. The first ancestor of this Zheng family to migrate to Fujian was Zheng Shu during the Five Dynasties period. By Zheng Hao, it was already the eighth generation. According to the genealogy, Zheng Hao decided to move here after taking a fancy to the Feng Shui of Zhengwei Village.

;

;Walking around the village, even a person who doesn't understand Feng Shui can easily see that the terrain of this village is indeed a bit special. Surrounded by two mountains like an armchair, the village "sits" safely in the mountain col between the two armrests. The opening of the armchair faces north, and a small stream flows through the entrance of the village, blocking the village in the mountain col. Fu Shan Tang is located in the west of the village - at the foot of the west armrest of the "armchair".

;

;;

;

;Looking northeast from Fushan Hall, Zhengwei Village has a panoramic view. Under the setting sun, the rammed earth walls of folk houses in northern Fujian turn golden. Photo by Southern Weekend reporter Wang Huazhen

;

;Although the old people in the village do not understand architecture, they have passed down from generation to generation that Fushan Hall was built by a man named Zhang Fushan in the Song Dynasty. Before Zheng came to the village, the main families in the village were Zhang and Wei. I don’t think this legend is likely to be an attachment, but Fushan Hall was probably built in the Song Dynasty, because the inscription mentions “reconstruction”.

;

;In 2021, Zhou Miao met Fu Shan Tang for the first time. He stayed there for a long time, "it was really beyond imagination," he recalled his feelings at that time to the Southern Weekend reporter. He is a young teacher in the Department of Architecture of Zhejiang City University and is fond of ancient dwellings in northern Fujian and southern Zhejiang.

;

;Liang Sicheng, in "The History of Chinese Architecture in Pictures", described the three periods of existing ancient architecture in China from the perspective of the history of artistic styles. The architecture of the Tang Dynasty was "grand. "Jing" became "mellow" from the Song and Yuan Dynasties to the early Ming Dynasty, and "straight" during the Ming and Qing Dynasties. Zhou Miao's research focuses on the transformation of architecture in the Tang and Song Dynasties. When he saw Fushan Hall, his professional intuition told him that the combination of columns, beams, and brackets had a "Song style".

;

;In this era, to be able to find a metastructure in the humid south is a rare thing for any architectural scholar.

;

;In the field of ancient architecture, there is a saying that "Look to Shanxi in the north and Fujian in the south." The quantity, quality and density of preserved ancient buildings in these two provinces are far behind. more than other provinces. But Fujian is more unique than Shanxi. "Shanxi is close to the Central Plains and the capitals of past dynasties, and the overall evolution of architecture has been relatively synchronized with the Central Plains dynasties. Maybe some styles have changed in the Central Plains, and Shanxi will also change in about 50 years." But Fujian is different, especially in the mountainous areas of northern Fujian and southern Zhejiang. , the development of architecture lags behind. If we see a style from the Song Dynasty there, it may be as late as the early Ming Dynasty. "So when we see a house in Fujian with a fairly old style, we dare not make a judgment." Zhou Miao said.

;

;However, Jian'ou, located in the upper reaches of the Min River, is a mountainous area, but it was the first area in Fujian to be developed by Han immigrants. In 206 AD, the Sun Wu regime established Jian'an County, the first county-level administrative region in Fujian history, in today's Jianou. Until the Song Dynasty, Jianzhou, centered on Jianou, was the cultural center of Fujian. At that time, Jianban books were popular all over the world, and Zhu Xi's Neo-Confucianism was also nurtured here.

;

;Zhou Miao later realized that although the mountainous areas of northern Fujian further north were developed very late, the narrow valley area in the upper reaches of the Min River was not too late. Specific to the style of architecture, there may also be a "time difference" between the Jian'ou area and other northern Fujian areas. This time difference "hedges" the time difference between northern Fujian and the Central Plains.

;

;"Weird power confuses the gods," Liu Yan said, pointing to the intricately carved cat beams and dou bao on the beams of Fushan Hall. Based on this intuition, he also boldly speculated that Fushan Hall was built in the Yuan Dynasty. "It feels like it is earlier than the Ming Dynasty, but it is unlikely to be in the Song Dynasty. Because both the Song and Ming Dynasties tend to be orthodox and regular. Only the buildings of the Yuan Dynasty can have this kind of unconventional and unconventional style." Weird and weird approach."

;

;;

;

;The beams of Fushan Hall are carved with complicated and strange cat beams and fighting arms. Photo by Southern Weekend reporter Wang Huazhen

;

;I will not write my discovery into a public account article for the time being. After posting it, I refused all media interviews, " He feels that he has completed his historical mission," Liu Yan said.
